title: ‘Army of the Dead’ and Top Five Zombie Movies
description:
Zack Snyder returns to the undead with his new Netflix blockbuster 'Army of the Dead.' Sean is joined by Chris Ryan and Adam Nayman to discuss Snyder's latest, what makes a great zombie movie, and share their five favorites from the genre.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Chris Ryan and Adam Nayman
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
